periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 15, with temperatures rising to around 17 overnight. East northeast wind around 2 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 41, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 3 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers after midnight. Cloudy. Low around 35, with temperatures rising to around 43 overnight. South wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 50. Southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Rain Showers then Chance Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 3am, then a chance of snow showers. Cloudy, with a low around 29. North northwest wind 5 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 31. Northwest wind 15 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 13. Northwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Washington's Birthday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 28. North wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night

periods.name: Tuesday

periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers after noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 27. North northeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
